text: Saignelégier is a municipality in the canton of Jura in Switzerland. It is the seat of the district of Franches-Montagnes. The bog and nature preserve around étang de la Gruère is in the municipality. On 1 January 2009, the former municipalities of Goumois and Les Pommerats merged into the municipality of Saignelégier. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of the municipality of Saignelégier Category:Municipalities in Franches-Montagnes
title: Saignelégier
